content.question: <math alttext="the integral from negative infinity to 1, of, x squared, times 2 raised to the x cubed power, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>∞</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math> is

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction 6 over the natural log of 2, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 2 over 3 times the natural log of 2, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 2 times the natural log of 2 over 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction 2 over 3 times the natural log of 2, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
